description.value:
You don the awesome fury of Kulnoghrim the Terrible, bringing his fiery wrath and madness down on your enemies.

Daily âœ¦ Arcane, Fire, Implement

Standard Action • Area burst 1 within 10 squares

Target: Each creature in the burst

Attack: Constitution vs. Reflex

Hit: 3d10 fire damage and ongoing 10 fire damage (save ends).

Miss: Half damage and ongoing 5 fire damage (save ends).

Vestige Pact: You gain access to the vestige of Kulnoghrim.

Kulnoghrim Pact Boon: One creature within 5 squares or affected by your Warlock's Curse makes a basic attack against a target of your choice as a free action.

Eyes of the Vestige Augment: If your eyes of the vestige target doesn't end its next turn farther from you than it began the turn, it takes fire damage equal to your Intelligence modifier.

Published in Dragon Magazine 383, page(s) 42.
